<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<CANIndFillEezzReq xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="CANIndFillEezzReq.xsd">
    <REQ_HEADER>
        <ENTITY_ID>{{entity_id}}</ENTITY_ID>
        <UNIQUE_ID></UNIQUE_ID>
        <REQUEST_TYPE>CANINDREG</REQUEST_TYPE>
        <LOG_USER_ID>{{ecan_login_id}}</LOG_USER_ID>
        <EN_ENCR_PASSWORD>{{ecan_encrypt_pwd}}</EN_ENCR_PASSWORD>
        <VERSION_NO>1.00</VERSION_NO>
        <TIMESTAMP>{{curr_time_stamp}}</TIMESTAMP>
    </REQ_HEADER>
    <REQ_BODY>
        <REQ_ENT_VIA></REQ_ENT_VIA>
        <REQ_EVENT>CR</REQ_EVENT>
        <!-- CR - CAN CREATION EVENT , CM  CAN Modification Event-->
        <CAN></CAN>
        <!--  Only for CAN Modification -->
        <REG_TYPE>E</REG_TYPE>
        <!--  Physical,Electronic (P,E) -->
        <PROOF_UPLOAD_BY_CAN>N</PROOF_UPLOAD_BY_CAN>
        <!--  Y-YES ,N - NO -->
        <ENABLE_ONLINE_ACCESS_FLAG>Y</ENABLE_ONLINE_ACCESS_FLAG>
        <!--  Y-YES ,N - NO -->
        <ENTITY_EMAIL_DETAILS>
            <EMAIL_ID></EMAIL_ID>
            <EMAIL_ID></EMAIL_ID>
        </ENTITY_EMAIL_DETAILS>
        <HOLDING_TYPE>SI</HOLDING_TYPE>
        <INV_CATEGORY>I</INV_CATEGORY>
        <TAX_STATUS>RI</TAX_STATUS>
        <HOLDER_COUNT>1</HOLDER_COUNT>
        <HOLDER_RECORDS>
            <HOLDER_RECORD>
                <HOLDER_TYPE>PR</HOLDER_TYPE>
                <!-- PR,SE,TH,GU -->
                <NAME>Kabilesh</NAME>
                <DOB>1983-01-20</DOB>
                <PAN_EXEMPT_FLAG>N</PAN_EXEMPT_FLAG>
                <PAN_PEKRN_NO>{{pan_number}}</PAN_PEKRN_NO>
                <AADHAAR_NO></AADHAAR_NO>
                <!-- As of version 5.5 of eCAN specification, this should be blank always. -->
                <RELATIONSHIP></RELATIONSHIP>
                <!-- Applicable only for Gaurdian Holder -->
                <REL_PROOF></REL_PROOF>
                <!-- Applicable only for Gaurdian Holder -->
                <NOM_VER_FLAG></NOM_VER_FLAG>
                <NOM_VER_IP></NOM_VER_IP>
                <KYC_DATA>
                    <KYC_STATUS></KYC_STATUS>
                    <SOURCE_KRA></SOURCE_KRA>
                    <RES_ADDR_DETAIL>
                        <ADDR1></ADDR1>
                        <ADDR2></ADDR2>
                        <ADDR3></ADDR3>
                        <CITY></CITY>
                        <PINCODE></PINCODE>
                        <STATE></STATE>
                        <COUNTRY></COUNTRY>
                    </RES_ADDR_DETAIL>
                    <PER_ADDR_DETAIL>
                        <ADDR1></ADDR1>
                        <ADDR2></ADDR2>
                        <ADDR3></ADDR3>
                        <CITY></CITY>
                        <PINCODE></PINCODE>
                        <STATE></STATE>
                        <COUNTRY></COUNTRY>
                    </PER_ADDR_DETAIL>
                </KYC_DATA>
                <CONTACT_DETAIL>
                    <RES_ISD></RES_ISD>
                    <RES_STD></RES_STD>
                    <RES_PHONE_NO></RES_PHONE_NO>
                    <MOB_ISD_CODE></MOB_ISD_CODE>
                    <PRI_MOB_NO>{{mobile_number}}</PRI_MOB_NO>
                    <PRI_MOB_BELONGSTO>SE</PRI_MOB_BELONGSTO>
                    <!--  S-SELF,F-FAMILY -->
                    <ALT_MOB_NO></ALT_MOB_NO>
                    <OFF_ISD></OFF_ISD>
                    <OFF_STD></OFF_STD>
                    <OFF_PHONE_NO></OFF_PHONE_NO>
                    <PRI_EMAIL>{{email_id}}</PRI_EMAIL>
                    <PRI_EMAIL_BELONGSTO>SE</PRI_EMAIL_BELONGSTO>
                    <!--  S-SELF,F-FAMILY -->
                    <ALT_EMAIL></ALT_EMAIL>
                    <PRI_MOB_VER_FLAG></PRI_MOB_VER_FLAG>
                    <PRI_EMAIL_VER_FLAG></PRI_EMAIL_VER_FLAG>
                    <PRI_MOB_IP_ADDR></PRI_MOB_IP_ADDR>
                    <PRI_EMAIL_IP_ADDR></PRI_EMAIL_IP_ADDR>
                    <PRI_MOB_VER_TS></PRI_MOB_VER_TS>
                    <PRI_EMAIL_VER_TS></PRI_EMAIL_VER_TS>
                </CONTACT_DETAIL>
                <OTHER_DETAIL>
                    <GROSS_INCOME>03</GROSS_INCOME>
                    <NET_WORTH></NET_WORTH>
                    <NET_DATE></NET_DATE>
                    <SOURCE_OF_WEALTH></SOURCE_OF_WEALTH>
                    <SOURCE_OF_WEALTH_OTH></SOURCE_OF_WEALTH_OTH>
                    <KRA_ADDR_TYPE>1</KRA_ADDR_TYPE>
                    <OCCUPATION>01</OCCUPATION>
                    <OCCUPATION_OTH></OCCUPATION_OTH>
                    <PEP>NA</PEP>
                    <ANY_OTH_INFO></ANY_OTH_INFO>
                </OTHER_DETAIL>
                <FATCA_DETAIL>
                    <BIRTH_CITY>BHARUCH</BIRTH_CITY>
                    <BIRTH_COUNTRY>101</BIRTH_COUNTRY>
                    <BIRTH_COUNTRY_OTH></BIRTH_COUNTRY_OTH>
                    <CITIZENSHIP>101</CITIZENSHIP>
                    <CITIZENSHIP_OTH></CITIZENSHIP_OTH>
                    <NATIONALITY>101</NATIONALITY>
                    <NATIONALITY_OTH></NATIONALITY_OTH>
                    <TAX_RES_FLAG>N</TAX_RES_FLAG>
                </FATCA_DETAIL>
            </HOLDER_RECORD>
        </HOLDER_RECORDS>
        <ARN_DETAILS>
            <!--  RIA Code need to add -->
            <ARN_NO></ARN_NO>
            <RIA_CODE></RIA_CODE>
            <!-- RIA Code -->
            <EUIN_CODE></EUIN_CODE>
        </ARN_DETAILS>
        <CONSENT_DETAILS>
            <CONSENT_RECORD>
                <DATA_SET>PD</DATA_SET>
                <ENABLED_CONSENT>Y</ENABLED_CONSENT>
            </CONSENT_RECORD>
            <CONSENT_RECORD>
                <DATA_SET>CD</DATA_SET>
                <ENABLED_CONSENT>Y</ENABLED_CONSENT>
            </CONSENT_RECORD>
            <CONSENT_RECORD>
                <DATA_SET>MF</DATA_SET>
                <ENABLED_CONSENT>N</ENABLED_CONSENT>
            </CONSENT_RECORD>
            <CONSENT_RECORD>
                <DATA_SET>HD</DATA_SET>
                <ENABLED_CONSENT>N</ENABLED_CONSENT>
            </CONSENT_RECORD>
        </CONSENT_DETAILS>
        <DP_DETAILS>
            <NSDL_DP_ID></NSDL_DP_ID>
            <NSDL_CLIENT_ID></NSDL_CLIENT_ID>
            <NSDL_PROOF_ID></NSDL_PROOF_ID>
            <NSDL_VER_FLAG></NSDL_VER_FLAG>
            <CDSL_DP_ID></CDSL_DP_ID>
            <CDSL_CLIENT_ID></CDSL_CLIENT_ID>
            <CDSL_PROOF_ID></CDSL_PROOF_ID>
            <CDSL_VER_FLAG></CDSL_VER_FLAG>
        </DP_DETAILS>
        <BANK_DETAILS>
            <!--Multiple Record-->
            <BANK_RECORD>
                <SEQ_NUM>1</SEQ_NUM>
                <DEFAULT_ACC_FLAG>Y</DEFAULT_ACC_FLAG>
                <ACCOUNT_NO>1234656789</ACCOUNT_NO>
                <ACCOUNT_TYPE>SB</ACCOUNT_TYPE>
                <BANK_ID>065</BANK_ID>
                <MICR_CODE>400065002</MICR_CODE>
                <IFSC_CODE>ABHY0065002</IFSC_CODE>
                <PROOF>14</PROOF>
                <RUP_VER_FLG></RUP_VER_FLG>
                <RUP_BENE_NAME></RUP_BENE_NAME>
                <RUP_THRESHOLD></RUP_THRESHOLD>
                <RUP_IP_ADDR></RUP_IP_ADDR>
                <RUP_TS></RUP_TS>
            </BANK_RECORD>
        </BANK_DETAILS>
        <NOMINEE_DETAILS>
            <NOM_DECL_LVL>C</NOM_DECL_LVL>
            <NOMIN_OPT_FLAG>Y</NOMIN_OPT_FLAG>
            <NOM_FOLIO_SOA>Y</NOM_FOLIO_SOA>
            <NOMINEES_RECORDS>
                <NOMINEE_RECORD>
                    <SEQ_NUM>1</SEQ_NUM>
                    <NOMINEE_NAME>xyz</NOMINEE_NAME>
                    <RELATION>MFU01</RELATION>
                    <PERCENTAGE>100</PERCENTAGE>
                    <DOB>1974-06-18</DOB>
                    <NOM_GURI_NAME></NOM_GURI_NAME>
                    <NOM_GURI_REL></NOM_GURI_REL>
                    <NOM_GURI_DOB></NOM_GURI_DOB>
                    <NOM_PI_TYPE>PA</NOM_PI_TYPE>
                    <NOM_PI_NO>XXXPO9090X</NOM_PI_NO>
                    <NOM_MOBILE>9876543212</NOM_MOBILE>
                    <NOM_EMAIL>sample@gmail.com</NOM_EMAIL>
                    <NOM_ADDR1>Anna Nagar</NOM_ADDR1>
                    <NOM_ADDR2>Anna Nagar</NOM_ADDR2>
                    <NOM_ADDR3>Anna Nagar</NOM_ADDR3>
                    <NOM_PINCODE>642001</NOM_PINCODE>
                    <NOM_CITY>COimbatore</NOM_CITY>
                    <NOM_COUNTRY>101</NOM_COUNTRY>
                </NOMINEE_RECORD>
            </NOMINEES_RECORDS>
        </NOMINEE_DETAILS>
    </REQ_BODY>
</CANIndFillEezzReq>

formdata.description: Login User Id
Encrypted Password
Entity ID
Module ID  - Indicating the type of module for which image is uploaded. Value should be ECAN

Event Type of the Image
Possible values are
  AD -> Upload New Proof Image for the CAN
  UP -> Update Existing Proof Image for the CAN
   DE -> Delete the existing Proof Image for the CAN
CAN  - CAN Id for which the proof image is uploaded. Sample value given

Image Reference Number .
This field is mandatory for Update and Delete event only. For Add event it should be empty.
In Case of Update, Old Image will not be available in MFU System.

Module Related information to indicate the type of proof being uploaded. Possible values are:
1#PC -> Copy of PAN of all Holder(s)/Guardian
2#BP -> Proof of Bank Account provided
3#BC -> Minor Birth Certificate proof
4#FA -> Document proof related to other information submitted for eCAN
8#NF -> Nomination Form

Please note that the number and # symbol are part of values. For PAN Proof the value should be 1#PC and for Birth Certificate it will be 3#BC
Upload Image

formdata.description: Login User Id
Encrypted Password
Entity ID
Module ID  - Indicating the type of module for which image is uploaded. Value should be ECAN

Event Type of the Image
Possible values are
  AD -> Upload New Proof Image for the CAN
  UP -> Update Existing Proof Image for the CAN
   DE -> Delete the existing Proof Image for the CAN
CAN  - CAN Id for which the proof image is uploaded. Sample value given

Image Reference Number .
This field is mandatory for Update and Delete event only. For Add event it should be empty.
In Case of Update, Old Image will not be available in MFU System.

Module Related information to indicate the type of proof being uploaded. Possible values are:
1#PC -> Copy of PAN of all Holder(s)/Guardian
2#BP -> Proof of Bank Account provided
3#BC -> Minor Birth Certificate proof
4#FA -> Document proof related to other information submitted for eCAN
8#NF -> Nomination Form

Please note that the number and # symbol are part of values. For PAN Proof the value should be 1#PC and for Birth Certificate it will be 3#BC
Upload Image

NORMAL-TXN : Normal Transaction Service

A unique Entity ID, as available in MFU for the Distributor / RIA or such other Entity using this facility. 
The Entity ID shall be provided by MFU to the Entity while setting up the UAT / Production environments.

Version number for the Web service. For example, V1.00
The version number is used to manage future changes to the web services.

The request initatied timestamp in Entity System.
The time format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

The requested Module Type.
SCHD-ENTRY
SCHD-STATUS
SCHD-CANCEL

Login ID of the user  initiating the API request
The Login ID shall be provided by MFU to the Entity while setting up the UAT / Production environments.
The password should be encrypted using AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding algorithm. MFU will provide a  public key and a IvKey for password encryption at the time of integration
